Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.lwjgl.openal.AL10.AL_DATA
    This token is a relict of the early OpenAL days and is no longer supported. Neither the OpenAL spec nor OpenAL Soft define it.
    org.lwjgl.input.Keyboard.KEY_LWIN
    Use KEY_LMETA instead
    org.lwjgl.input.Keyboard.KEY_RWIN
    Use KEY_RMETA instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL40.glGetActiveSubroutineUniform(int, int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL40.glGetActiveSubroutineUniformi(int, int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBUniformBufferObject.glGetActiveUniformBlock(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBUniformBufferObject.glGetActiveUniformBlocki(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL31.glGetActiveUniformBlock(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL31.glGetActiveUniformBlocki(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBUniformBufferObject.glGetActiveUniforms(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBUniformBufferObject.glGetActiveUniformsi(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL31.glGetActiveUniforms(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL31.glGetActiveUniformsi(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL15.glGetBufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL15.glGetBufferParameteri(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL32.glGetBufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL32.glGetBufferParameteri64(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.GLES20.glGetBufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GLES20.glGetBufferParameteri(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBBufferObject.glGetBufferParameterARB(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBBufferObject.glGetBufferParameteriARB(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameter(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameteri(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL30.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameter(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL30.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameteri(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.GLES20.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameter(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GLES20.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameteri(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.EXTFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameterEXT(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use EXTFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameteriEXT(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.OESFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameterOES(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use OESFramebufferObject.glGetFramebufferAttachmentParameteriOES(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL20.glGetProgram(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL20.glGetProgrami(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.GLES20.glGetProgram(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GLES20.glGetProgrami(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBProgram.glGetProgramARB(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBProgram.glGetProgramiARB(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.NVProgram.glGetProgramNV(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use NVProgram.glGetProgramiNV(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL40.glGetProgramStage(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL40.glGetProgramStagei(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL15.glGetQuery(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL15.glGetQueryi(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBOcclusionQuery.glGetQueryARB(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBOcclusionQuery.glGetQueryiARB(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL40.glGetQueryIndexed(int, int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL40.glGetQueryIndexedi(int, int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL33.glGetQueryObject(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL33.glGetQueryObjecti64(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL33.glGetQueryObjectu(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL33.glGetQueryObjectui64(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameteri(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL30.glGetRenderbufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL30.glGetRenderbufferParameteri(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.GLES20.glGetRenderbufferParameter(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GLES20.glGetRenderbufferParameteri(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.EXTFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameterEXT(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use EXTFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameteriEXT(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.OESFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameterOES(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use OESFramebufferObject.glGetRenderbufferParameteriOES(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL20.glGetShader(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL20.glGetShaderi(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengles.GLES20.glGetShader(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GLES20.glGetShaderi(int, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.ARBSync.glGetSync(GLSync, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use ARBSync.glGetSynci(org.lwjgl.opengl.GLSync, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL32.glGetSync(GLSync, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL32.glGetSynci(org.lwjgl.opengl.GLSync, int) instead.
    org.lwjgl.opengl.GL40.glGetUniformSubroutineu(int, int)
    Will be removed in 3.0. Use GL40.glGetUniformSubroutineui(int, int) instead.
